name: Around and Around
description:
This is a project made by Yuefeng He and Zheng Pan for the CTIN 485 class from USC. Two players will compete on the small plant aiming to push the bomb to the opposite side before the explosion. Protect your side of the world! 

The itch page of Yuefeng: https://kitaruk.itch.io/

Control:

  • Player 1 (Keyboard):
    • Press Enter to initialize the character
    • Press R to start/restart the round
    • WASD for movement
    • Move Mouse to control the view
    • Mouse left to shoot projectiles
    • Mouse right to place jump-pad
    • Space to dash
  • Player 2 (Controller):
    • Press the Menu button to initialize the character
    • Left stick for movement
    • Right stick to control view
    • Right trigger to shoot projectiles
    • Right shoulder to place jump-pad
    • Left trigger to dash

Goal:

  • Push the bomb to the opposite-colored side of the planet before the explosion. The bomb will become the winner's color.
